    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product()
        Constructs an empty Product object.

      • Product

        public Product(int id,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               float price,
               int amount,
               Measure measure)
        Constructs a Product object with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the product
        name - the name of the product
        description - the description of the product
        price - the price of the product
        amount - the quantity of the product available in stock
        measure - the measure of the product

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public Product clone(Product product)
        Function that returns copy of Product as new object.
        Parameters:
        product - Product object. Each field of given object is copied to a new object
        Returns:
        new Product

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this object to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null, is an instance of Product and is an object with the same fields as this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - A Product object to compare this Product against
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a Product equivalent to this Product, false otherwise

      • printProduct

        public void printProduct()
        Prints values of every field to console.

      • readFromFile

        public static java.util.List<Product> readFromFile(java.lang.String file)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads data from json file. If file exists, it creates JsonParser and tries to parse every json-object to Product object till the end of file. Every persed json-object is saved to ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read the products from
        Returns:
        a list of Product objects read from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String file)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the current Product object to a file in JSON format.
        Parameters:
        file - the path to the file where the object will be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the file

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(java.util.List<Product> productList)
        Shuffles the order of elements in the given list of Product objects.
        Parameters:
        productList - the list of Product objects to be shuffled

      • writeProductsToNewFile

        public static void writeProductsToNewFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                                          java.util.List<Product> productList)
        Writes the given list of Product objects to a new file in JSON format.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path to the file where the list of products will be written
        productList - the list of Product objects to be written to the file
